name: Wisdom of the Dark Beta Version
name_original: Wisdom of the Dark Beta Version
description: Wisdom of the dark is a thought-provoking indie platformer which takes place in the mind of a young girl. After a tragic car accident, the girl is put into a coma to help her body recover, and the game takes place in her mind during that time. Traveling through various different scenes, the girl collects insight which just might change her entire perspective on life . . .
